com.ieireference.system.drawing

Class SwingDrawsUtility

extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a class for Swing use in Draw auto components.

    • Constructor Detail

    • Method Detail

      • AutoDrawLabelAndProgressBar

        public static void AutoDrawLabelAndProgressBar(javax.swing.JLabel label,
                                               javax.swing.JProgressBar bar,
                                               java.lang.String labelmodel,
                                               java.lang.String decimalFormat,
                                               BufferType type,
                                               boolean drawStringPercentage,
                                               DownloadEvent params)
                                        throws java.lang.NullPointerException,
                                               CharSequenceNotFoundException,
                                               java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException
        Draw Download Label and ProgressBar in Swing. If you try use WebClient and need of a progress bar and a label, here is a solution.
        In labelmodel need put {0} and {1} for replace in bytesIn and bytesTotal

        String text = "{0}/{1} then put other thing for decorate"; SwingDrawsUtility.AutoDrawLabelAndProgressBar(..., text, ...);
        Parameters:
        label - The label for draw
        bar - The ProgressBar for draw
        labelmodel - The label model for draw like "{0}/{1} MB or KB or other" just needs of {0} and {1}.
        decimalFormat - The decimal format to use in {0} and {1}
        type - The type of byte for format. This is used for format the text without leave the number too long.
        drawStringPercentage - Enable or not bar.setStringPainted();
        params - If you use WebClient put DownloadEvent here.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - If some parameter is null.
        CharSequenceNotFoundException - If {0} and {1} has not found.
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - If labelmodel have more than 1 {0} or {1}.
